heading: Today
text: Any morning fog and high clouds giving way to sunshine.  Some clouds late through southern counties of VT, NH, into MA. Highs 50 to 55.  Winds light, becoming northeast up to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clouds increasing from south to north. A chance of rain showers late in the Hudson Valley.  Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s.  Winds light and variable.

heading: Thursday
text: Some early sun northeast.  Thickening clouds, with rain spreading north through NY, reaching into the Berkshires and Green Mountains. A rising chance of showers, mainly afternoon, east into NH.  Highs 50 to 55, a few upper 40s in the Adirondacks.  Light winds, becoming east near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the afternoon.
